hero.title: Welcome
hero.subtitle: SoulTribe.chat is a space created to help you find and connect with your soul tribe — people who resonate with your energy, your spirit, and your journey. ✨

how.title: How It Works
how.step1: Create Your Profile — enter birth date, time, and place to generate your unique soul map.
how.step2: Discover Your Matches — we highlight connections based on compatibility and resonance.
how.step3: Start the Conversation — invite matches to chat; safe and private by design.
how.step4: Meet Up (Optional) — schedule a Jitsi call or in‑person meetup with mutual consent.

getting_started.title: Getting Started
getting_started.step1: Create your account — no social logins required.
getting_started.step2: Complete your profile — add birth details; approximate time is okay.
getting_started.step3: Set your availability — propose local time slots; we handle UTC.
getting_started.step5: Chat & optionally meet — keep it in‑app; schedule when ready.

features.title: Features
features.item1: Astrology‑aware matching — connect using your natal chart.
features.item2: Timezone smart scheduling — we handle UTC conversions for you.
features.item3: Direct communication via Jitsi — text/audio/video; nothing is stored or recorded on SoulTribe.chat.
features.item4: Easy link join — private Jitsi room for confirmed meetups; privacy‑friendly, no desktop install required.
features.item5: Minimalist, focused UI — designed for meaningful conversations.

privacy.title: Privacy & Safety
privacy.item1: We only ask for what’s needed to enable soulful connections.
privacy.item2: Your profile details are not sold or shared with ad networks.
privacy.item3: You control who can contact you and when to disclose more.

matching.title: How Matching Works (Short Version)
matching.text: We compute key relational indicators from your chart and compare them with others to find resonance. We prioritize harmony, complementarity, and potential for growth over generic popularity metrics.

protips.title: Pro Tips
protips.item1: Add a few availability slots across different days for quicker connections.
protips.item2: Be genuine in your intro — specifics help the right people find you.
protips.item3: Consent first, always. Move at the pace that feels right.

global.title: Global Community, Local Time
global.text: Connect with like-minded souls across the globe with automatic timezone conversion.
global.auto_text: We automatically detect your timezone for seamless scheduling.
global.native_text: Chat in your preferred language with our built-in translation.
global.tz_text: No more timezone math - we handle all the conversions for you.

profile.title: Your Profile

birth.instructions: Set your birth date and location to compute your radix. If you don't know the exact time, leave the time field empty and we will use a noon fallback.

profile.note: Your profile is used to personalize matches and time zone display.

radix.title: Your Radix
radix.placeholder: If you have set your birth data, your radix snapshot will appear here.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.overlap_hint: Click “Propose this time” on an overlap to propose a meetup for that slot.
dashboard.active_filter_hint: Only users active in the last 30 days are shown.
